T01TD1172E:250a-1: pa ra ma na gu ru dharm'a r'a dza sto tra n'a ma /
T01TD1172E:250a-3: bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa zhes bya ba /
T01TD1172E:250a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1172E:250a-5: rab rgyas rta yi dpung gi dba' rlabs phreng ba mtho zhing zhags pa ral gri mdung rnon gyis //
T01TD1172E:250a-6: chu la rgyu ba rab mang 'jigs rung rnga chen sgra ldan hor zhes bya ba dus mtha' yi //
T01TD1172E:250a-7: chu gter 'di ni mtha' dag mkhas pa'i bla ma gang gi zur mig rol pas 'jig rten rnams //
T01TD1172E:250a-8: zhi slad rab mchog rgyal ba'i tshul la zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal po de ni rgyal gyur cig / nub phyogs bod kyi ri la shin tu dri med 'char ba thob cing shar phyogs dag gi yul //
T01TD1172E:250a-9: rim pas mnan pa gang gi rmongs pa las skyes shin tu rab rgyas mun pa bcom byas nas //
T01TD1172E:250a-10: sems can byang chub grong khyer phyin slad chos gsung 'od zer dra bas rab mtshungs sangs rgyas la //
T01TD1172E:250a-11: rab tu gsal mdzad chos kyi rgyal po mchog gi 'od zer phreng ldan de ni rgyal gyur cig / gnyis ldan mtha' dag skye bo rnams la phan pa bgyid slad rgyun du rab mchog rgyal ba yi //
T01TD1172E:250a-12: khyu mchog sems can dag la brten gang rdzogs ldan la ni rkang pa bzhi dang gsum gang la //
T01TD1172E:250a-13: rkang pas mnan dang gnyis ldan dag la rkang zung gis rgyu rtsod la rkang gcig lhag ma can //
T01TD1172E:250b-0: gang gis sa la rdzogs ldan bzhin du rgyu mdzad chos kyi rgyal po de ni @250b rgyal gyur cig / gang zhig 'jig rten dag nas gzhi 'byung po 'dzin byed nyi ma dag kyang 'jig rten ni //
T01TD1172E:250b-1: snang ba dag nang ldan par byed cing sprin rnams char pa 'bebs byed rlung yang g-yo //
T01TD1172E:250b-2: zla ba bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rnam par spro byed nam mkha'i go skabs sbyin la rab tu dpa' //
T01TD1172E:250b-3: de bzhin chos kyi rgyal pos zol med snying rje sems can kun la rab tu 'jug par byed //
T01TD1172E:250b-4: bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa /
T01TD1172E:250b-5: rgya gar gyi pandi ta snyan ngag mkhan chen po lakshm'i ka ras sbyar ba'o //
T01TD1172E:250b-7: lo ts'a ba shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o /
